text: Park Han-bin (; born 21 September 1997) is a South Korean football midfielder who plays for Daegu FC and the South Korea national under-20 football team. == Club career == Park joined Daegu FC in 2016http://www.kleague.com/KOR_2016/record/data_7.asp?player=20160097 kleague.com and made his league debut against FC Anyang on 25 May 2016.https://int.soccerway.com/players/han-bin-park/440330/ soccerway == International career == He has been a member of the South Korea national U-20 team since 2015.http://www.kfa.or.kr/national/player.asp?Query=Grade%3DMU20%26Sumons%3D1396%26Player%3D13349 kfa.com == Club career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
